title: Designing Digital-Integrated Language Education for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and beginner-level language learning experience
context.additional_context: A vocational training context requiring the construction of language learning environments using digital tools, with the core challenge being inducing learners' cognitive and emotional engagement.

learning_goals: Learners can apply 50 basic language expressions contextually using digital tools (apps, tablets).
Learners can complete language tasks using digital collaboration tools (real-time translators, shared documents) with peers.
Learners can record learning outcomes in weekly digital portfolios and develop self-directed learning plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
